Yup! Very nice fanwork indeed Sec. :) Now do it again! How about 
Tsutomu a=
nd his daddy practicing Kendo? Or Fujita-san running around 
waving the inf=
amous stick? Hehehehe!

And just like Phil, I too shall see Saitou's "rough=
ness" on Kenshin 
as a mask on his wants, an almost burning need to be with=
 someone... 
Of course, there's fluff for the gals (*cough* any gal) in my =
little 
perfect AU world of wolfie-kun. <-- sap sap sap

~Kizu
